code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchPage=()=>{const[searchTerm,setSearchTerm]=useState("");const[images,setImages]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const searchImages=async()=>{if(!searchTerm.trim()){alert("Please enter a search term");return;}setLoading(true);try{const PIXABAY_API_KEY="49707751-675bfff183d462455a7b5907c";const url=`https://pixabay.com/api/?key=${PIXABAY_API_KEY}&q=${encodeURIComponent(searchTerm)}&image_type=photo`;const res=await fetch(url);if(!res.ok){const errorText=await res.text();throw new Error(`Pixabay API Error: ${res.status} - ${errorText}`);}const data=await res.json();setImages(data.hits);}catch(err){console.error("Error fetching images:",err.message);alert("Failed to fetch images. Check your API key or try again later.");}setLoading(false);};const handleAddCaptions=imgUrl=>{navigate("/editor",{state:{imgUrl}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Image Search"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex space-x-2 mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"border px-2 py-1 w-64",placeholder:"Search for images...",value:searchTerm,onChange:e=>setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:searchImages,className:"bg-blue-600 text-white px-4 py-1 rounded",children:"Search"})]}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading images..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4",children:images.map(img=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"border p-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:img.previewURL,alt:img.tags,className:"w-full h-auto mb-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleAddCaptions(img.largeImageURL),className:"bg-green-600 text-white px-3 py-1 text-sm rounded",children:"Add Captions"})]},img.id))})]});};export default SearchPage;
